attributes.action: remember why people voted for Labour in 1997, get some focus and get on with the job.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Those who voted for Labour 11 years ago feel badly let down. Blair did a lot of damage, and we realise you need time to repair that.
Labour is a Socialist party, but you seem to have lost the plot on this. We don't want you covering the Tories' ground. We want a clear alternative, and its just not there right now.
Stop taxing everything we do, remember what communities, society and families are, please.

We do support you, and are not impressed with the spineless Blarites who are trying to undermine you. But, you have to get a grip. Let your ministers do their jobs, stop trying to knee-jerk react, or grab headlines.

Get on with the job!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
